events.message: I received my order yesterday, but the product has a large scratch on the surface and looks damaged.
The inquiry has been classified under product defect due to the mention of damage and scratches.
A customer service agent has been assigned to handle the report about the scratched product.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear about the issue with your product. I’m here to help resolve this as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide photos of the scratch and the packaging so we can assess the damage more accurately?
Sure, I have attached several pictures showing the scratch and the box it came in as requested.
Thank you for the photos. We can offer you a replacement product or a full refund, whichever you prefer.
I would like to receive a replacement, please. Thank you for resolving this so quickly.
We have processed your replacement order and you will receive it within 5 business days. We apologize again for the inconvenience.
Just checking in to confirm that your replacement product arrived and is in perfect condition. Please let us know if any further issues.
Yes, the replacement arrived today and looks great. Thank you for the excellent support!
We are glad to hear you are satisfied. Closing this case now. Have a great day!
